description:
An intuitive video editor for every skill level.

Filmora is an intuitive video editor for every skill level. Filmora makes it easy for anyone to be creative. Jump into an editing experience where advanced features are simple and fun. We got rid of repetitive tasks so you can devote your energy to your imagination. Get inspired by Filmora, an editor designed for creators like you.
1. Upgraded 32-bit Audio Pipeline
Filmora V15 introduces a new 32-bit audio pipeline for higher fidelity and dynamic range. If you need to revert to V14, please choose: File → Save As Legacy Project to save a project compatible with older versions.
2. AI Extend
Effortlessly extend your clips with AI Extend. Continue video and audio directly within your timeline for seamless storytelling.
3. Pen Tool
Use the Pen Tool to freely draw paths and shapes, apply a variety of stroke effects, and bind them to clips for dynamic motion tracking.
4. Animated Charts
One-click data import to generate visualized charts, with rich built-in animation presets and highly customizable styles.
5. Dynamic Captions
Enhanced subtitle editing experience with support for batch text processing and newly added exclusive animation effects.
6. Import Subprojects
Import multiple project files as compound clips to support multi-project management and cross-project material reuse.
7. Source & Timeline Preview Editing
Use the “Source Monitor” to preview materials in the Media Library and the “Timeline Monitor” to preview your timeline project, enabling efficient dual-screen editing.
8. Dual-Timeline Editing
Manage multiple compound clips through tabs, easily switch between primary and secondary timelines, and enhance editing efficiency for complex projects.
9. Smart Cutout Upgrade
Upgraded the smudging interaction in Smart Cutout to accurately identify user intentions, reduce repeated adjustments, and handle complex edges more clearly.
10. AI Object Remover Upgrade
The removal effect has been fully upgraded — introducing the Magic Box, which allows quick removal of watermarks, subtitles, people, and other distractions while keeping the image clear, natural, and seamless.
11. System & Compatibility Improvements.
